thread.title: Thomas

author: Thomas
title: Thomas
text: I first ordered a replacement Dyson hose from another company. It didn't fit and they sent a second hose and that didn't fit either. I then found Vacuum Direct and ordered a replacement hose that came in four days and fit perfectly. The price was a lot less than from other vendors. Needless to say, very pleased with the price, quality and service from Vacuum Direct.
